function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of ventilation rates in facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of virus-laden particles concentration","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and regular maintenance","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, UVGI, air purifiers","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Inadequate environmental cleaning and maintenance","Impact":"Increase in surface contamination and virus transmission","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection protocols, proper waste management","Technologies":"Environmental cleaning tools and products, disinfectants","People":"Housekeeping staff, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Ineffective building measures for virus mitigation","Impact":"Higher risk of virus spread and infection","Mitigation":"Implementing engineering controls, smart building technologies, and HVAC systems","Technologies":"Engineering controls, smart building technologies, HVAC systems","People":"Facility management team, engineering staff","Owner":"Facility management team"}]}
